headlines.description: — Alex Ovechkin scored for the first time this season, Dylan Strome added a pair of goals and the Washington Capitals beat the Minnesota Wild 5-1 on Friday night for their fourth straight victory.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ovechkin scores 898th goal as Capitals top Wild 5-1 for their 4th straight victory

headlines.description: — Brock Boeser scored in the fourth round of the shootout and the Vancouver Canucks beat the Chicago Blackhawks 3-2 on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Boeser scores in 4th round of shootout to lift Canucks to 3-2 win over Blackhawks

events.name: San Jose Sharks at Utah Mammoth

headlines.description: — Nick Schmaltz had three goals and an assist, and the Utah Mammoth beat the San Jose Sharks 6-3 on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Schmaltz has three goals and an assist as Mammoth beat Sharks 6-3
